body:
{
  tenantProperties: [
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If enabled, unified events will be used to determine creation RCAs for FTL shipments.',
      key: 'USE_UNIFIED_EVENTS_FOR_FTL_CREATION_RCA',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'This flag enables out of order stops, supporting shipments without predefined stop order.',
      key: 'ENABLE_OUT_OF_ORDER_STOPS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 48,
      description: 'This flag sets the number of hours after the destination delivery window for timeout of the trackingjob and also sets the value for how many hours in the past the customer can create the shipment.',
      key: 'V3_TRUCKLOAD_TRACKING_JOB_TIMEOUT_AFTER_FINAL_STOP_IN_HOURS',
      overridden: true,
      type: 'Long',
      value: 96
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 0.00045,
      description: 'Minimum radius distance in latitude/longitude degrees between two stop locations needed to deduplicate them. If two locations are within this radius, they will be deemed the same and the second will not be successfully created.Note this only applies to locations without a specific house number and street address (city/state/postal code only) -- locations with a very specific address can be directly adjacent to each other and not be considered duplicates.The default radius is .00045 degrees, which is about 50 meters at the equator and <50 meters away from the equator.Warning: Only change this for a tenant who provides very precise location coordinates for locations that do not have a specific address as otherwise many different locations may be created around the same point that should have all been consolidated as a single location.',
      key: 'MINIMUM_RADIUS_TO_DEDUPLICATE_STOP_LOCATIONS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Double',
      value: 0.00045
    },
    {
      defaultValue: -1,
      description: 'Sets the interval in minutes at which we send ETA status updates to MG customers. (Intervals less than 0 = disabled, Intervals equal to 0 = send as often as possible, Intervals greater than 0 = send at specified interval based on last ETA for each stop sent)',
      key: 'MG_TLV_ETA_NOTIFICATION_INTERVAL_IN_MINUTES',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Long',
      value: -1
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'For use by QA only. Enables track-after-dispatch jobs for LTL shipments even when in test mode.',
      key: 'LTL_TRACK_AFTER_DISPATCH_IN_TEST_MODE',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'Generic status updates are sent or not based on this flag. Generic status updates are updates that have NULL value of statusCode',
      key: 'MG_TL_SEND_GENERIC_STATUS_UPDATE',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: 'Comma separated list of statuses that should be filtered out from TL status updates. Supported status codes: X3,AF,X6,X1,D1. Default value is empty filter which means all statuses are pushed to customer.',
      key: 'MG_TL_STATUS_FILTER_LIST',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'String',
      value: ''
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'This flag enables the TrackOS subscription-manager service to publish messages to the test data-feed-pipeline topic rather than the real data-feed-pipeline topic.',
      key: 'TRACK_OS_USE_MOCK_CONNECTOR',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Displays order and inventory data in a table on all TL shipments, powered by the Order and Inventory Services.  Cannot activate if Display_TL_Line_Item_Details flag is enabled',
      key: 'DISPLAY_TL_MODE_AGNOSTIC_ORDER_INVENTORY_TABLES',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If set to true, this disables the basic authentication fallback cache within Freighthub. This is required for tenants that want to lock their authentication to certain IdPs.',
      key: 'DISABLE_FH_BASIC_AUTH_FALLBACK',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: "If true, the new push-processor which uses virtual queues will be used to send the outbound push request to a customer's webhook. This should only be enabled after confirming with #global-services-eng.",
      key: 'SEND_OUTBOUND_PUSH_USING_V3',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: "Replaces Reference Number Type 'EDI Import Primary Reference' with the value set in this flag. For Disabling set value to an empty/blank string ''",
      key: 'MG_LTL_REPLACE_REF_NUM_TYPE_EDI_IMPORT_PRIMARY_REF',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'String',
      value: ''
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 180,
      description: 'The max amount of elapsed time since the last carrier update to be able to calculate an accurate ETA.',
      key: 'ETA_OUT_OF_DATE_THRESHOLD_INTERVAL_MINUTES',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Long',
      value: 180
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: 'Some vendors return images which contain their DPI density as metadata. This is a comma separated list of vendor identifiers which should use the built in density value instead of overriding it at 400 dpi.',
      key: 'IMAGE_VENDORS_TO_CONVERT_WITHOUT_DENSITY_OVERRIDE',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'String',
      value: ''
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'Enhancing Task with AI features such as summaries and suggestions',
      key: 'TASK_MANAGEMENT_AI_ENHANCEMENTS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Beta feature returning a static url with a google maps of their shipment',
      key: 'TRACKING_MAP_ENABLED',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: "When set to true we will consider a shipment late based on it's arrival to a stop compared to the scheduled arrival.",
      key: 'VOC_TL_SET_LATE_STATUS_BASED_ON_SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Use this to control whether the truckload tracking should be done via trackOs or via truckload tracking. If this is false, truckload tracking is done via truckload-service. If this is true, truckload tracking is done via track-os service',
      key: 'TRACK_OS_TRUCKLOAD_TRACKING',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If enabled, users granted access to shipments via Access Groups will also be granted access to orders that are related to those shipments. This allows shipment-based access to implicitly include access to related orders.',
      key: 'ENABLE_INDIRECT_ORDER_ACCESS_VIA_SHIPMENTS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'Enables whether shipment stop is marked as arrived if the first ping is inside the stop',
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_STOP_ARRIVAL_FIRST_PING_LOGIC',
      overridden: true,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If HERE maps cannot geocode the address for stops, we will check location service to see if the location exists before calling HERE again to geocode at the postal code or city level. This means smart geofences won’t apply to the shipment and we will miss milestones.',
      key: 'TL_FALLBACK_TO_CITY_CENTER_ADDRESS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 39600,
      description: 'Set the number of seconds in travel time a truck must be from a stop in order for project44 to being reporting the earliest estimated arrival time.',
      key: 'V3_TRUCKLOAD_ETA_SECONDS_ESTIMATION_THRESHOLD',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Float',
      value: 39600
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'This flag enables TrackOS to be used in the Unified shipment tracking APIs, in place of legacy tracking systems.',
      key: 'TRACK_OS_SHIPMENT_TRACKING_ENABLED',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'This will enable or disable weather on shipment details page map',
      key: 'ENABLE_WEATHER_ON_MAPS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: "This tenant is a demo tenant, or pov tenant with replayed shipments. The tenant's data shouldnot be used to generate insights and analytics.",
      key: 'TENANT_DATA_INVALID_FOR_INSIGHTS_AND_ANALYTICS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Use this to control whether data provided by the customer on a shipment (e.g., route information, events) will cascade to ocean related shipments discovered by project44.',
      key: 'UNIFIED_CASCADE_ON_OCEAN_RELATED_SHIPMENTS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Generate Public Shipment Share Link Based Off Tenant Flag.',
      key: 'USE_AUTHENTICATED_URL_IN_SHARE',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If true, the EBOL API will be invoked before invoking the Dispatch(Pickup) API for the given carrier.',
      key: 'EBOL_AUTO_TRANSMISSION_ENABLED',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Enables truckload shipments to be created without a tracking method. Shipments in this state are awaiting additional vehicle information in order to begin tracking.',
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_PENDING_SHIPMENT_TRACKING_ENABLED',
      overridden: true,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: "Enables MercuryGate customers to receive an implied 'AF' picked up status when 'PICKED_UP' is not received from the carrier.",
      key: 'MG_LTL_IMPLY_PICKED_UP_STATUS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Determines if the reverse geocoder for status updates should include street address by querying HERE. Should only be enabled if required by customer.',
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_REVERSE_GEOCODE_INCLUDE_STREET_ADDRESS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'This flag enables TMS Freight Audit feature, which allows for the auditing of freight charges in TMS.',
      key: 'ENABLE_TMS_FREIGHT_AUDIT',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: 'Comma-separated reference keys to hide on the publicly available shipment and order share links. If HIDE_ALL_REF_KEYS_SHARE_LINKS is also enabled, it will take precedence over this setting.',
      key: 'HIDE_SPECIFIC_REF_KEYS_SHARE_LINKS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'String',
      value: ''
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 10,
      description: 'Determines what should be the earliest timestamp of a record which is considered a hit in HOURS.',
      key: 'ITM_TIME_BEFORE_PICKUP',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Integer',
      value: 10
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Every shipment created for tenant with this property enabled will be simulated as Ocean D2D shipment without any external calls to providers.',
      key: 'ENABLE_OCEAN_D2D_TRACKING_SIMULATION',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: "When this feature is disabled, only status updates that significantly change a shipment's location or status will be pushed to downstream consumers. When this feature is enabled, every status update, including every idle status update, will be pushed to downstream consumers.",
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_TRACKING_PUSH_EVERY_STATUS_UPDATE',
      overridden: true,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'This will show or hide the mapUrl link to the VOC on a push event for LTL tracking',
      key: 'LTL_ENABLE_MAP_SHARE_URL_FOR_PUSH_TRACKING',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If enabled, ocean-insights-integration will not initiate tracking using ocean carriers for any D2D shipment.',
      key: 'SUPPRESS_OCEAN_CARRIER_TRACKING_FOR_D2D_SHIPMENTS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: 'Set a project44 app URL where users in the tenant will be redirected after they log in unless the login page already has a redirect_uri configured in its query parameters for the specific login event.',
      key: 'DEFAULT_LANDING_URL_AFTER_LOGIN',
      overridden: true,
      type: 'String',
      value: 'https://movement.project44.com/'
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'When enabled, consecutive TL shipments with the same equipment identifier won’t track until the first one is complete.',
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_ENABLE_SIBLING_LOGIC',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Displays order and inventory data in a table on all Ocean shipments, powered by the Order and Inventory Services',
      key: 'DISPLAY_OCEAN_MODE_AGNOSTIC_ORDER_INVENTORY_TABLES',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: 'Provide a comma-separated list of identifiers for telematics vendors that should be enabled for all newly-created shipments (e.g., SENSI_GUARD, EMERSON, etc.).',
      key: 'V3_TRUCKLOAD_ENABLED_TELEMATICS_VENDOR',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'String',
      value: ''
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 360,
      description: "Maximum sibling shipment delay time, after which the consecutive shipment will become active, regardless of the previous shipment's state",
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_SIBLING_LOGIC_MAX_DELAY_TIME',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Integer',
      value: 360
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Enables whether shipment search results will show (call-out) additional fields on the search result cards',
      key: 'VOC_ENABLE_ADDITIONAL_SEARCH_MATCHING_DISPLAY',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: 'Use this to configure TMS Booking to push all booking updates to a given webhook.\n' +
        'Webhooks are configured through the webhooks API to set up the target url and authentication parameters.\n' +
        'To disable pushing, set to an empty string.',
      key: 'BOOKING_UPDATE_WEBHOOK_NAME',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'String',
      value: ''
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 1609.34,
      description: 'Set the maximum number of meters a truck must be along a direct path to its previous location after 15 minutes to consider it IDLE. The actual threshold will be a minimum of 75% of this value and a maximum of 125% of this value depending on the time difference between updates.',
      key: 'V3_TRUCKLOAD_IDLE_METERS_THRESHOLD',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Float',
      value: 1609.34
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'This will enable or disable quickview v2 on landing page',
      key: 'QUICKVIEW_V2_ENABLED',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'This is used to identify if the tenant was created as a participant of shared or supplier visibility',
      key: 'NOT_CREATED_FOR_SHARED_SUPPLIER_VIZ',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Every Air D2D shipment created for a tenant with this property enabled will be simulated without any external calls to providers.',
      key: 'ENABLE_AIR_D2D_TRACKING_SIMULATION',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: -1,
      description: 'Sets the interval in minutes at which we send IN_TRANSIT status updates to MG customers. (Intervals less than 0 = disabled, Intervals equal to 0 = send as often as possible, Intervals greater than 0 = send at specified interval based on last IN_TRANSIT sent)',
      key: 'MG_TLV_IN_TRANSIT_NOTIFICATION_INTERVAL_IN_MINUTES',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Long',
      value: -1
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 10,
      description: 'Enables MercuryGate customers to set the timeout between our internal rating service and the Capacity Providers.',
      key: 'MG_LTL_RATING_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Integer',
      value: 10
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'If this property and UNIFIED_SHARE_LINK_FOR_MOVEMENT are both set to true, truckload tracking APIs will return shipment share links to Movement, otherwise they will return VOC links',
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_MOVEMENT_SHARE_LINK',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If set to true, we will attempt to generate a pre-shipment ETA for an order using the transit-time-service.',
      key: 'ORDER_LEAD_TIME_ENABLED',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Displays order and inventory data in a table on all Rail shipments, powered by the Order and Inventory Services',
      key: 'DISPLAY_RAIL_MODE_AGNOSTIC_ORDER_INVENTORY_TABLES',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'If enabled, all eligible users of a tenant will receive the automated truckload tracking performance email report',
      key: 'AUTOMATED_TRUCKLOAD_TRACKING_PERFORMANCE_EMAIL_REPORT',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If true, sensors will be initialized for truckload shipments containing sensor information.',
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_ENABLE_SENSORS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: "NEVER NEWLY ENABLE THIS FOR ANY TENANTS. THIS PROPERTY OWNED BY IAM ENGINEERING AND INFOSEC TEAMS. This property exists to support some customer client apps that we failed to prevent from sending OAuth2 client credentials insecurely as query parameters. Normally, query parameters must not be used for any secrets, but some client apps started sending their credentials this way, and we unfortunately accepted them. We use this property to enforce that all other client apps cannot send credentials insecurely as query params going forward, while ensuring we don't break those that already do and while asking them to switch to a secure authentication method.",
      key: 'ENABLE_OAUTH2_CREDENTIALS_AS_QUERY_PARAMS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Enables MercuryGate customers to default any ZERO weight line items to a value of ONE for LTL Dispatch.',
      key: 'MG_LTL_DEFAULT_ZERO_WEIGHT_LINE_ITEMS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: -1,
      description: 'THIS WAS NEVER ACTUALLY IMPLEMENTED. DOES NOTHING. Maximum number of requests to process for a single batch rating upload, -1 is unlimited',
      key: 'BATCH_RATING_REQUEST_LIMIT',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Long',
      value: -1
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY. Disables the check on all new status updates that they are at least 90% of the job repeat interval since the last status update. This allows QA to create many status updates at the same time.',
      key: 'V3_TRUCKLOAD_DISABLE_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL_CHECK',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: 'Provide a comma separated list of 1 or more transportation modes to hone the route ETA calculation from transit-time-service. Available modes are: AIR, OCEAN, RAIL, TRUCKLOAD, PARCEL, LTL. If this property is left blank, the transit-time-service will attempt to determine the appropriate mode.',
      key: 'ORDER_LEAD_TIME_DEFAULT_MODES',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'String',
      value: ''
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 'P_44',
      description: 'A list of comma separated ftl market rate provider vendor ids that need to fetch the market rates from providers available in the list',
      key: 'FTL_MARKET_RATE_PROVIDERS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'String',
      value: 'P_44'
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If true, the "Early" truckload shipment status labels will appear as "On-Time" in the shipment list and details pages.',
      key: 'RENDER_EARLY_SHIPMENTS_AS_ONTIME_TL',
      overridden: true,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Enables MercuryGate customers to have fuel surcharges calculated as percentage rates instead of flat rate values during an LTL Rating request',
      key: 'MG_LTL_RATING_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PERCENT_CALCULATION',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'Determines if the ETA update should use the downsample logic when a new status update is received in Truckload Tracking Service',
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_USE_ETA_UPDATE_DOWNSAMPLE_LOGIC',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If true, display document upload components on the shipment details page in the VOC.',
      key: 'ENABLE_MANUAL_DOCUMENT_UPLOAD',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'If enabled, p44 will use HEREv7 Geocoder',
      key: 'ENABLE_HERE_V7_GEOCODER',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: "A list of comma separated vendor ids that should use EDI instead of the vendor's API when connector service supports both EDI and API. If a connector service does not support EDI the vendor id being present in this list will have no effect. (e.g EXLA,ODFL,SAIA)",
      key: 'EDI_VENDOR_IDS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'String',
      value: ''
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'SC-3: AWS S3 imaging/document buckets will no longer be created on a per tenant basis. Due to AWS limitations, all new tenants that have imaging enabled will store images in a bucket that is based on the environment that it lives in (i.e. prod, sandbox, qa/stage, qa/int, eu). This will need to be set to TRUE (also the default) for all new tenants. Note that new tenants can NOT have this flag set to false after 2019/11/19.',
      key: 'STOP_USING_TENANT_SPECIFIC_IMAGING_S3_BUCKET',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'If set to true a customer will be able to update a TL shipment with invalid equipment identifiers. If false the update will fail.',
      key: 'ENABLE_INVALID_EQUIPMENT_IDENTIFIER_UPDATES',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: "If enabled, all users coming in through the customer's IdP as determined by the IdP routing rules, such as those based on email domain, will have their access groups automatically set by reading the customerIdpAccessGroups field of their Okta profile during SSO login, overriding any roles set before. Any access groups set via UI/API will be overwritten the next time the user logs in",
      key: 'ENABLE_IDP_ACCESS_GROUP_TRANSFER',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: 4000,
      description: 'Distance in meters that a truck must be from a stop in order to trigger AT_STOP status',
      key: 'TRUCKLOAD_DISTANCE_BASED_GEOFENCE_METERS_THRESHOLD',
      overridden: true,
      type: 'Float',
      value: 1000
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If set to true, load uniqueness constraints are activated. Loads are defined as unique by masterShipmentId and a common orderType, orderIdentifier and orderIdentifierAuthority across all orderIdentifierReferences of all items. Enabling load uniqueness requires order uniqueness and will thus internally enable ENFORCE_ORDER_NUMBER_UNIQUENESS.',
      key: 'ENFORCE_LOAD_UNIQUENESS',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: false,
      description: 'If true, Movement will set the map to the China Worldview. If false, Movement will use the default map settings.',
      key: 'MOVEMENT_USE_CHINA_WORLDVIEW',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: false
    },
    {
      defaultValue: '',
      description: "A list of comma separated ltl push vendor ids that need subscribe api call at the time of start shipment tracking request, this is to distinguish different types of CARRIERS that doesn't require subscribe call",
      key: 'PUSH_SUBSCRIPTION_CARRIER_IDS',
      overridden: true,
      type: 'String',
      value: 'P_44'
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
      description: 'If true, Carrier Assure scores will be shown in Initiate in relation to carrier data. Carrier Assure is a third party platform that provides scores based on carrier data.',
      key: 'SHOW_CARRIER_ASSURE_SCORES_IN_INITIATE',
      overridden: false,
      type: 'Boolean',
      value: true
    },
    {
      defaultValue: true,
